concept.title: Base64 Decoder
concept.shortdesc: The Base64 Decoder decodes Base64 encoded data to binary data. Use the processor to decode Base64 encoded data before evaluating data in the field.

conbody.draft-comment: SDC-2685 requests changing processor name to "Base64 Field Decoder"
conbody.p: processorsBase64 DecoderBase64 Decoder processoroverviewWhen you configure Base64 Decoder, you specify the byte array field to decode and the target byte array field to pass the decoded value to.
